Personalized Toothbrush Designer: Create an online platform where users can design their own customized electric toothbrushes. Offer a range of colors, handle shapes, and bristle styles to cater to different preferences and needs.

Toothbrush Tracker: Develop a Bluetooth-enabled toothbrush that tracks brushing time, brushing technique, and oral hygiene. Provide users with real-time feedback and personalized recommendations to improve their oral care routine.

Smart Toothbrush with AI Technology: Integrate artificial intelligence into the toothbrush to provide personalized oral care recommendations based on users' dental history and current oral health. Offer suggestions for improved brushing techniques and provide alerts for routine maintenance.

Interactive Toothbrush Games: Develop interactive games and activities that can be played on the toothbrush itself, encouraging kids to brush their teeth for the full recommended 2 minutes. Games could include fun characters, music, and rewards for completing each brushing session.

Portable Toothbrush Charger: Create a toothbrush that doubles as a portable charger, allowing users to charge their phone or other devices on the go. This innovative design would appeal to environmentally conscious consumers who want to reduce their reliance on disposable batteries.
